author: J14T14
title: A Golden Item for a Golden Fan Base
review:
I found this at the LEGO store in Downtown Disney in Anaheim, California a few days ago. I thought that is was really cool since I don't have any chrome- gold elements. This set came out 5 years ago, during the 55th anniversary of the LEGO brick. I think that it would have been better if they had waited to release this till this year for they 60th anniversary, but that is only my opinion.

The keychain it self seems to be made of a regular tan brick that was painted chrome-gold, then drilled into the side and had a keychain installed. There are bits of plastic sticking out on the inside from this process, but it doesn't bother me much.

Overall, I think that this set is for serious LEGO collectors who want a cool, one of a kind idem to display and to show off. A regular chrome-gold 2x4 brick has never been released in an official set, so this is truly a piece that people should be proud to own.
